verses.text: The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w perisheth|strong="H0006"\w*, and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w layeth|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* to \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: and \w merciful|strong="H2617"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add are\add* taken \w away|strong="H0622"\w*, none \w considering|strong="H0995"\w* that the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H0622"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add to come\add*.\f + \fr 57.1 \ft merciful…: Heb. men of kindness, or, godliness\f*\f + \fr 57.1 \ft from…: or, from that which is evil\f*

He shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: they shall \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* in their \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*, \add each one\add* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \add in\add* his \w uprightness|strong="H5228"\w*.\f + \fr 57.2 \ft enter into: or, go in\f*\f + \fr 57.2 \ft in his…: or, before him\f*

¶ But draw \w near|strong="H7126"\w* hither, ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w sorceress|strong="H6049"\w*, the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w adulterer|strong="H5003"\w* and the \w whore|strong="H2181"\w*.

Against whom do ye \w sport|strong="H6026"\w* yourselves? against whom make ye a \w wide|strong="H7337"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \add and\add* draw \w out|strong="H0748"\w* the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*? \add are\add* ye not \w children|strong="H3206"\w* of \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, a \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*,

\w Enflaming|strong="H2552"\w* yourselves with \w idols|strong="H0410"\w* under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w slaying|strong="H7819"\w* the \w children|strong="H3206"\w* in the \w valleys|strong="H5158"\w* under the \w clifts|strong="H5585"\w* of the \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*?\f + \fr 57.5 \ft with…: or, among the oaks\f*

Among the \w smooth|strong="H2511"\w* \add stones\add* of the \w stream|strong="H5158"\w* \add is\add* thy \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*; they, they \add are\add* thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*: even to them hast thou \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* a drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*, thou hast \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*. Should I receive \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* in these?

Upon a \w lofty|strong="H1364"\w* and \w high|strong="H5375"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* hast thou \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*: even thither wentest thou \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

\w Behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* also and the \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* hast thou set \w up|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w*: for thou hast \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* \add thyself to another\add* than me, and art gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; thou hast \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, and \w made|strong="H3772"\w* thee \add a covenant\add* with them; thou \w lovedst|strong="H0157"\w* their \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w where|strong="H3027"\w* thou \w sawest|strong="H2372"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 57.8 \ft made…: or, hewed it for thyself larger than theirs\f*\f + \fr 57.8 \ft where…: or, thou providedst room\f*

And thou \w wentest|strong="H7788"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* with \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*, and didst \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w perfumes|strong="H7547"\w*, and didst \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w messengers|strong="H6735"\w* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, and didst \w debase|strong="H8213"\w* \add thyself even\add* unto \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*.\f + \fr 57.9 \ft thou…: or, thou respectedst\f*

Thou art \w wearied|strong="H3021"\w* in the \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* of thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; \add yet\add* \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w* thou not, There is no \w hope|strong="H2976"\w*: thou hast \w found|strong="H4672"\w* the \w life|strong="H2416"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; therefore thou wast not \w grieved|strong="H2470"\w*.\f + \fr 57.10 \ft life: or, living\f*

And of whom hast thou been \w afraid|strong="H1672"\w* or \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, that thou hast \w lied|strong="H3576"\w*, and hast not \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* me, nor \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* to thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*? have not I held my \w peace|strong="H2814"\w* even of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*, and thou \w fearest|strong="H3372"\w* me not?
I will \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*; for they shall not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* thee.

¶ When thou \w criest|strong="H2199"\w*, let thy \w companies|strong="H6899"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee; but the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* shall carry them all \w away|strong="H5375"\w*; \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add them:\add* but he that putteth his \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in me shall \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*;

And shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Cast ye \w up|strong="H5549"\w*, cast ye \w up|strong="H5549"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H6437"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, take \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w stumblingblock|strong="H4383"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w high|strong="H7311"\w* and lofty \w One|strong="H5375"\w* that \w inhabiteth|strong="H7931"\w* \w eternity|strong="H5703"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w*; I \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w high|strong="H4791"\w* and \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \add place\add*, with him also \add that is\add* of a \w contrite|strong="H1793"\w* and \w humble|strong="H8217"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, to \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w humble|strong="H8217"\w*, and to \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the contrite \w ones|strong="H1792"\w*.

For I will not \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, neither will I be \w always|strong="H5331"\w* \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w*: for the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* should \w fail|strong="H5848"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, and the \w souls|strong="H5397"\w* \add which\add* I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

For the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of his \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w* was I \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him: I \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* me, and was \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w*, and he went \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w frowardly|strong="H7726"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 57.17 \ft frowardly: Heb. turning away\f*

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* him: I will \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* him also, and \w restore|strong="H7999"\w* \w comforts|strong="H5150"\w* unto him and to his \w mourners|strong="H0057"\w*.

I \w create|strong="H1254"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H5108"\w* of the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*; \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to \add him that is\add* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, and to \add him that is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and I will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* him.

But the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add are\add* like the \w troubled|strong="H1644"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, when it \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, whose \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* cast \w up|strong="H1644"\w* \w mire|strong="H7516"\w* and \w dirt|strong="H2916"\w*.
\add There is\add* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
